text: jo ko'i strine potana pati vise durvyavahara ane laparavahino bhaya hoya to banne andaro'andara je suleha kari le temam ko'ina para ko'i guno nathi, suleha ghani ja uttama vastu che, lalaca dareka jivamam dakhala kari devamam avi che, jo tame sadvyavahara karo ane darava lago, to tame je kari rahya cho tene allaha ta'ala puri rite janavavalo che
